a3ComMipControl.name: a3ComMipControl
a3ComMipControl.description: If this object is set to enabled(1), then multicast IP routing is in service. If it is set to disabled(2), then multicast IP routing is turned off.

a3ComMipPortTable.name: a3ComMipPortTable
a3ComMipPortTable.description: This table contains entries of parameters associated with every port or tunnel.

a3ComMipPortEntry.name: a3ComMipPortEntry
a3ComMipPortEntry.description: Each entry contains information for a spcified port or tunnel.

a3ComMipPortIndex.name: a3ComMipPortIndex
a3ComMipPortIndex.description: The port number or tunnel ID of which this entry applies. The tunnel ID starts with 1025 and end with 1056, i.e. total tunnel number is limited to 32.

a3ComMipPortQueryInterval.name: a3ComMipPortQueryInterval
a3ComMipPortQueryInterval.description: This object specifies the time interval in seconds that a Host Query message is sent to the attached subnet to request for the local group membership. It also derives the Membership Expiration time which is set to two times value of this object plus 20 seconds. This object cannot be applied on tunnel port.

a3ComMipPortThreshold.name: a3ComMipPortThreshold
a3ComMipPortThreshold.description: This object specifies the minimum IP TTL required for a multicast datagram to be forwarded to the given port or tunnel.

a3ComMipPortQuerier.name: a3ComMipPortQuerier
a3ComMipPortQuerier.description: This object specifies if the system is responsible for sending out Host Query messages on this port. If the value is yes(1) then the system is the designated router on the subnet this port connects to and the system is sending out Host Query messages periodically on that port. This object must be set to value no(2) for tunnel port.

a3ComMipPortPaceMode.name: a3ComMipPortPaceMode
a3ComMipPortPaceMode.description: This object is used to control PACE mode. If set to enabled(1), the multicast packets will be sent out with the Universal/Local bit set, or Priority MAC. If set to disabled(2) the Universal/Local bit is clear, or Interactive MAC.

a3ComMipLocalGroupTable.name: a3ComMipLocalGroupTable
a3ComMipLocalGroupTable.description: This table contains group membership information of each attached subnet.

a3ComMipLocalGroupEntry.name: a3ComMipLocalGroupEntry
a3ComMipLocalGroupEntry.description: Each entry contains a group membership information associated with a specific port.

a3ComMipLocalGroupPort.name: a3ComMipLocalGroupPort
a3ComMipLocalGroupPort.description: This object specifies the port number to which this entry applies.

a3ComMipLocalGroupIpAddr.name: a3ComMipLocalGroupIpAddr
a3ComMipLocalGroupIpAddr.description: This object specifies group's address presents on the specified port. If the port is configured as a tunnel, there will be no group address associated with it.

a3ComMipLocalGroupType.name: a3ComMipLocalGroupType
a3ComMipLocalGroupType.description: This object specifies the type of local group. This object can only be set to 'static' by SET command, and if the local group is learned from IGMP, it is set to 'igmp'.

a3ComMipLocalGroupStatus.name: a3ComMipLocalGroupStatus
a3ComMipLocalGroupStatus.description: This object is used to add and delete entries in this table. See the definition of RowStatus for detail.

a3ComMipSmdsGroupTable.name: a3ComMipSmdsGroupTable
a3ComMipSmdsGroupTable.description: This table contains a set of IP network address and SMDS group address mapping.

a3ComMipSmdsGroupEntry.name: a3ComMipSmdsGroupEntry
a3ComMipSmdsGroupEntry.description: Each entry contains an IP network address to SMDS group address mapping.

a3ComMipSmdsGroupIpAddr.name: a3ComMipSmdsGroupIpAddr
a3ComMipSmdsGroupIpAddr.description: This is an IP network address for which there is a corresponding SMDS group address.

a3ComMipSmdsGroupMediaAddr.name: a3ComMipSmdsGroupMediaAddr
a3ComMipSmdsGroupMediaAddr.description: This is the SMDS group address that corresponds to the IP network address identified by a3ComMipSmdsGroupIpAddr.

a3ComMipSmdsGroupStatus.name: a3ComMipSmdsGroupStatus
a3ComMipSmdsGroupStatus.description: This object is used to add and delete entries in this table. See the definition of RowStatus for detail.
